sentences: Hän on käynyt siellä vain kerran.
Kerron hänelle tämän heti kun näen hänet.
context: The Finnish word 'kerran' is an adverb that means 'once' or 'one time'. It indicates a single occurrence of an action. This word can appear in different positions within sentences and is often used to specify how many times something has happened will happen, particularly when referring to a singular instance.
